scripts.build:all: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client:prod: npm run build:client && npm run minify:client
scripts.build:server:prod: npm run build:server && npm run minify:server
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:all && npm run minify:all
scripts.minify:client: terser dist/client/index.js -o dist/client/index.min.js --compress --mangle --source-map && terser dist/client/ioa-client-sdk.js -o dist/client/ioa-client-sdk.min.js --compress --mangle --source-map
scripts.minify:server: terser dist/server/index.js -o dist/server/index.min.js --compress --mangle --source-map && terser dist/server/ioa-server-sdk.js -o dist/server/ioa-server-sdk.min.js --compress --mangle --source-map
scripts.minify:all: npm run minify:client && npm run minify:server
